name: Food Delivery App Ui Kit - Delaft
description:
Hello guys!

Meet Delaft, a fully-featured UI Design kit for Food Ordering, Online Ordering, Restaurant and Food Delivery App, including exclusive design files and beautiful illustrations editable in Figma.


This package includes a dark mode & light mode with 174 clean & minimal pre-made screens. We've added a lot of different content to maximize the number of layout options. Drag, drop and mix different parts to quickly build your own Food Ordering in a matter of minutes.


This is free version of Delaft.

Full version here: https://ui8.net/futix-lab-084578/products/best-food-ordering-app-ui-kit


I hope you find it useful and let know your review for this ui kit.

Enjoy it!
